promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic simple scorpion grass-type pokemon with a ancient crystal core. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or scorpion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystacule, a a dynamic simple scorpion grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Pollen Shield. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "scorpion", "grass" or "Crystacule". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, scorpion-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This emerald guardian thrives among forest foliage, using its Pollen Shield ability to protect its terrain. Agile and steadfast, its gem-like tail glimmers in the morning dew.
